General.Name: Matahari Department Store Tbk
General.Description: PT Matahari Department Store Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the retail business in Indonesia. The company's stores offer clothes, accessories, bags, shoes, cosmetics, and household appliances for men, women, and children. It also provides management consulting services. PT Matahari Department Store Tbk was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.
